snippet: Offerings at the Morgan Library & Museum will include semi-staged performances of two seldom-performed operas by Marc-Antoine Charpentier.
abstract: Offerings at the Morgan Library & Museum will include semi-staged performances of two seldom-performed operas by Marc-Antoine Charpentier.

headline.main: Some Music Old and New in Morgan Library & Museum's 2013-14 Season
headline.print_headline: Music at Morgan Library: The 2013-14 Season
